body_html:
@alicetragedy I've checked out the branch locally to reproduce the JSON error but got an undefined method 'join' for #<String:0x007ff9900b86f0> Did you mean? JSON instead. That was because I duped application data from last year.

I could get around that fix with this patch:

--- a/app/views/mentor/students/_student.html.slim
+++ b/app/views/mentor/students/_student.html.slim
@@ -1,6 +1,6 @@
 div.panel.panel-default
   div.panel-heading #{ApplicationDraft.human_attribute_name :student_application_coding_level }
-  div.panel-body #{SkillLevel::MATRIX[student.coding_level].join('<br>').html_safe}
+  div.panel-body #{Array(SkillLevel::MATRIX[student.coding_level]).join('<br>').html_safe}

 div.panel.panel-default
   div.panel-heading #{ApplicationDraft.human_attribute_name :student_application_code_samples }

Do you have a stacktrace for your error?
